casebody.data:
Debbie A. LEVANTI
v.
Margaret D. CONWAY et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2017

Debbie A. Levanti, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 904, 158 A.3d 448 (2017), is denied.
